17namespace v8 {
18namespace internal {
19
20class ReadOnlyHeapImageDeserializer final {
21 public:
22 static void Deserialize(Isolate* isolate, SnapshotByteSource* source) {
23 ReadOnlyHeapImageDeserializer{isolate, source}.DeserializeImpl();
24 }
25
26 private:
27 using Bytecode = ro::Bytecode;
28
29 ReadOnlyHeapImageDeserializer(Isolate* isolate, SnapshotByteSource* source)
30 : source_(source), isolate_(isolate) {}
31
32 void DeserializeImpl() {
33 while (true) {
34 int bytecode_as_int = source_->Get();
35 DCHECK_LT(bytecode_as_int, ro::kNumberOfBytecodes);
36 switch (static_cast<Bytecode>(bytecode_as_int)) {
37 case Bytecode::kAllocatePage:
38 AllocatePage();
39 break;
40 case Bytecode::kSegment:
41 DeserializeSegment();
42 break;
43 case Bytecode::kRelocateSegment:
44 UNREACHABLE(); // Handled together with kSegment.
45 case Bytecode::kReadOnlyRootsTable:
46 DeserializeReadOnlyRootsTable();
47 break;
48 case Bytecode::kFinalizeReadOnlySpace:
49 ro_space()->FinalizeSpaceForDeserialization();
50 return;
51 }
52 }
53 }
54
55 void AllocatePage() {
56 size_t expected_page_index = static_cast<size_t>(source_->GetUint30());
57 size_t actual_page_index = static_cast<size_t>(-1);
58 size_t area_size_in_bytes = static_cast<size_t>(source_->GetUint30());
59 if (V8_STATIC_ROOTS_BOOL) {
60 uint32_t compressed_page_addr = source_->GetUint32();
61 Address pos = isolate_->GetPtrComprCage()->base() + compressed_page_addr;
62 actual_page_index = ro_space()->AllocateNextPageAt(pos);
63 } else {
64 actual_page_index = ro_space()->AllocateNextPage();
65 }
66 CHECK_EQ(actual_page_index, expected_page_index);
67 ro_space()->InitializePageForDeserialization(PageAt(actual_page_index),
68 area_size_in_bytes);
69 }
70
71 void DeserializeSegment() {
72 uint32_t page_index = source_->GetUint30();
73 ReadOnlyPageMetadata* page = PageAt(page_index);
74
75 // Copy over raw contents.
76 Address start = page->area_start() + source_->GetUint30();
77 int size_in_bytes = source_->GetUint30();
78 CHECK_LE(start + size_in_bytes, page->area_end());
79 source_->CopyRaw(reinterpret_cast<void*>(start), size_in_bytes);
80
81 if (!V8_STATIC_ROOTS_BOOL) {
82 uint8_t relocate_marker_bytecode = source_->Get();
83 CHECK_EQ(relocate_marker_bytecode, Bytecode::kRelocateSegment);
84 int tagged_slots_size_in_bits = size_in_bytes / kTaggedSize;
85 // The const_cast is unfortunate, but we promise not to mutate data.
86 uint8_t* data =
87 const_cast<uint8_t*>(source_->data() + source_->position());
88 ro::BitSet tagged_slots(data, tagged_slots_size_in_bits);
89 DecodeTaggedSlots(start, tagged_slots);
90 source_->Advance(static_cast<int>(tagged_slots.size_in_bytes()));
91 }
92 }
93
94 Address Decode(ro::EncodedTagged encoded) const {
95 ReadOnlyPageMetadata* page = PageAt(encoded.page_index);
96 return page->OffsetToAddress(encoded.offset * kTaggedSize);
97 }
98
99 void DecodeTaggedSlots(Address segment_start,
100 const ro::BitSet& tagged_slots) {
101 DCHECK(!V8_STATIC_ROOTS_BOOL);
102 for (size_t i = 0; i < tagged_slots.size_in_bits(); i++) {
103 // TODO(jgruber): Depending on sparseness, different iteration methods
104 // could be more efficient.
105 if (!tagged_slots.contains(static_cast<int>(i))) continue;
106 Address slot_addr = segment_start + i * kTaggedSize;
107 Address obj_addr = Decode(ro::EncodedTagged::FromAddress(slot_addr));
108 Address obj_ptr = obj_addr + kHeapObjectTag;
109
110 Tagged_t* dst = reinterpret_cast<Tagged_t*>(slot_addr);
111 *dst = COMPRESS_POINTERS_BOOL
112 ? V8HeapCompressionScheme::CompressObject(obj_ptr)
113 : static_cast<Tagged_t>(obj_ptr);
114 }
115 }
116
117 ReadOnlyPageMetadata* PageAt(size_t index) const {
118 DCHECK_LT(index, ro_space()->pages().size());
119 return ro_space()->pages()[index];
120 }
121
122 void DeserializeReadOnlyRootsTable() {
123 ReadOnlyRoots roots(isolate_);
124 if (V8_STATIC_ROOTS_BOOL) {
125 roots.InitFromStaticRootsTable(isolate_->cage_base());
126 } else {
127 for (size_t i = 0; i < ReadOnlyRoots::kEntriesCount; i++) {
128 uint32_t encoded_as_int = source_->GetUint32();
129 Address rudolf = Decode(ro::EncodedTagged::FromUint32(encoded_as_int));
130 roots.read_only_roots_[i] = rudolf + kHeapObjectTag;
131 }
132 }
133 }
134
135 ReadOnlySpace* ro_space() const {
136 return isolate_->read_only_heap()->read_only_space();
137 }
138
139 SnapshotByteSource* const source_;
140 Isolate* const isolate_;
141};
142
143ReadOnlyDeserializer::ReadOnlyDeserializer(Isolate* isolate,
144 const SnapshotData* data,
145 bool can_rehash)
146 : Deserializer(isolate, data->Payload(), data->GetMagicNumber(), false,
147 can_rehash) {}
148
149void ReadOnlyDeserializer::DeserializeIntoIsolate() {
150 base::ElapsedTimer timer;
151 if (V8_UNLIKELY(v8_flags.profile_deserialization)) timer.Start();
152 NestedTimedHistogramScope histogram_timer(
153 isolate()->counters()->snapshot_deserialize_rospace());
154 HandleScope scope(isolate());
155
156 ReadOnlyHeapImageDeserializer::Deserialize(isolate(), source());
157 ReadOnlyHeap* ro_heap = isolate()->read_only_heap();
158 ro_heap->read_only_space()->RepairFreeSpacesAfterDeserialization();
159 PostProcessNewObjects();
160
161 ReadOnlyRoots roots(isolate());
162 roots.VerifyNameForProtectorsPages();
163#ifdef DEBUG
164 roots.VerifyNameForProtectors();
165#endif
166
167 if (should_rehash()) {
168 isolate()->heap()->InitializeHashSeed();
169 Rehash();
170 }
171
172 if (V8_UNLIKELY(v8_flags.profile_deserialization)) {
173 // ATTENTION: The Memory.json benchmark greps for this exact output. Do not
174 // change it without also updating Memory.json.
175 const int bytes = source()->length();
176 const double ms = timer.Elapsed().InMillisecondsF();
177 PrintF("[Deserializing read-only space (%d bytes) took %0.3f ms]\n", bytes,
178 ms);
179 }
180}
181
182void NoExternalReferencesCallback() {
183 // The following check will trigger if a function or object template with
184 // references to native functions have been deserialized from snapshot, but
185 // no actual external references were provided when the isolate was created.
186 FATAL("No external references provided via API");
187}
188
189class ObjectPostProcessor final {
190 public:
191 explicit ObjectPostProcessor(Isolate* isolate)
192 : isolate_(isolate), embedded_data_(EmbeddedData::FromBlob(isolate_)) {}
193
194 void Finalize() {
195#ifdef V8_ENABLE_SANDBOX
196 DCHECK(ReadOnlyHeap::IsReadOnlySpaceShared());
197 std::vector<ReadOnlyArtifacts::ExternalPointerRegistryEntry> registry;
198 registry.reserve(external_pointer_slots_.size());
199 for (auto& slot : external_pointer_slots_) {
200 registry.emplace_back(slot.Relaxed_LoadHandle(), slot.load(isolate_),
201 slot.tag());
202 }
203
204 isolate_->read_only_artifacts()->set_external_pointer_registry(
205 std::move(registry));
206#endif // V8_ENABLE_SANDBOX
207 }
208#define POST_PROCESS_TYPE_LIST(V) \
209 V(AccessorInfo) \
210 V(FunctionTemplateInfo) \
211 V(Code) \
212 V(SharedFunctionInfo)
213
214 V8_INLINE void PostProcessIfNeeded(Tagged<HeapObject> o,
215 InstanceType instance_type) {
216 DCHECK_EQ(o->map(isolate_)->instance_type(), instance_type);
217#define V(TYPE) \
218 if (InstanceTypeChecker::Is##TYPE(instance_type)) { \
219 return PostProcess##TYPE(TYPE::cast(o)); \
220 }
221 POST_PROCESS_TYPE_LIST(V)
222#undef V
223 // If we reach here, no postprocessing is needed for this object.
224 }
225#undef POST_PROCESS_TYPE_LIST
226
227 private:
228 Address GetAnyExternalReferenceAt(int index, bool is_api_reference) const {
229 if (is_api_reference) {
230 const intptr_t* refs = isolate_->api_external_references();
231 Address address =
232 refs == nullptr
233 ? reinterpret_cast<Address>(NoExternalReferencesCallback)
234 : static_cast<Address>(refs[index]);
235 DCHECK_NE(address, kNullAddress);
236 return address;
237 }
238 // Note we allow `address` to be kNullAddress since some of our tests
239 // rely on this (e.g. when testing an incompletely initialized ER table).
240 return isolate_->external_reference_table_unsafe()->address(index);
241 }
242
243 void DecodeExternalPointerSlot(Tagged<HeapObject> host,
244 ExternalPointerSlot slot) {
245 // Constructing no_gc here is not the intended use pattern (instead we
246 // should pass it along the entire callchain); but there's little point of
247 // doing that here - all of the code in this file relies on GC being
248 // disabled, and that's guarded at entry points.
249 DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc;
250 auto encoded = ro::EncodedExternalReference::FromUint32(
251 slot.GetContentAsIndexAfterDeserialization(no_gc));
252 Address slot_value =
253 GetAnyExternalReferenceAt(encoded.index, encoded.is_api_reference);
254 slot.init(isolate_, host, slot_value);
255#ifdef V8_ENABLE_SANDBOX
256 // Register these slots during deserialization s.t. later isolates (which
257 // share the RO space we are currently deserializing) can properly
258 // initialize their external pointer table RO space. Note that slot values
259 // are only fully finalized at the end of deserialization, thus we only
260 // register the slot itself now and read the handle/value in Finalize.
261 external_pointer_slots_.emplace_back(slot);
262#endif // V8_ENABLE_SANDBOX
263 }
264 void PostProcessAccessorInfo(Tagged<AccessorInfo> o) {
265 DecodeExternalPointerSlot(
266 o, o->RawExternalPointerField(AccessorInfo::kSetterOffset,
267 kAccessorInfoSetterTag));
268 DecodeExternalPointerSlot(o, o->RawExternalPointerField(
269 AccessorInfo::kMaybeRedirectedGetterOffset,
270 kAccessorInfoGetterTag));
271 if (USE_SIMULATOR_BOOL) o->init_getter_redirection(isolate_);
272 }
273 void PostProcessFunctionTemplateInfo(Tagged<FunctionTemplateInfo> o) {
274 DecodeExternalPointerSlot(
275 o, o->RawExternalPointerField(
276 FunctionTemplateInfo::kMaybeRedirectedCallbackOffset,
277 kFunctionTemplateInfoCallbackTag));
278 if (USE_SIMULATOR_BOOL) o->init_callback_redirection(isolate_);
279 }
280 void PostProcessCode(Tagged<Code> o) {
281 o->init_self_indirect_pointer(isolate_);
282 o->wrapper()->set_code(o);
283 // RO space only contains builtin Code objects which don't have an
284 // attached InstructionStream.
285 DCHECK(o->is_builtin());
286 DCHECK(!o->has_instruction_stream());
287 o->SetInstructionStartForOffHeapBuiltin(
288 isolate_,
289 EmbeddedData::FromBlob(isolate_).InstructionStartOf(o->builtin_id()));
290 }
291 void PostProcessSharedFunctionInfo(Tagged<SharedFunctionInfo> o) {
292 // Reset the id to avoid collisions - it must be unique in this isolate.
293 o->set_unique_id(isolate_->GetAndIncNextUniqueSfiId());
294 }
295
296 Isolate* const isolate_;
297 const EmbeddedData embedded_data_;
298
299#ifdef V8_ENABLE_SANDBOX
300 std::vector<ExternalPointerSlot> external_pointer_slots_;
301#endif // V8_ENABLE_SANDBOX
302};
303
304void ReadOnlyDeserializer::PostProcessNewObjects() {
305 // Since we are not deserializing individual objects we need to scan the
306 // heap and search for objects that need post-processing.
307 //
308 // See also Deserializer<IsolateT>::PostProcessNewObject.
309 PtrComprCageBase cage_base(isolate());
310#ifdef V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS
311 ExternalPointerTable::UnsealReadOnlySegmentScope unseal_scope(
312 &isolate()->external_pointer_table());
313#endif // V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS
314 ObjectPostProcessor post_processor(isolate());
315 ReadOnlyHeapObjectIterator it(isolate()->read_only_heap());
316 for (Tagged<HeapObject> o = it.Next(); !o.is_null(); o = it.Next()) {
317 const InstanceType instance_type = o->map(cage_base)->instance_type();
318 if (should_rehash()) {
319 if (InstanceTypeChecker::IsString(instance_type)) {
320 Tagged<String> str = String::cast(o);
321 str->set_raw_hash_field(Name::kEmptyHashField);
322 PushObjectToRehash(handle(str, isolate()));
323 } else if (o->NeedsRehashing(instance_type)) {
324 PushObjectToRehash(handle(o, isolate()));
325 }
326 }
327
328 post_processor.PostProcessIfNeeded(o, instance_type);
329 }
330 post_processor.Finalize();
331}
